contentrichtext.text: '''Lyapunov''' is a Russian surname that is sometimes [[Romanization of Russian|romanized]] as '''Ljapunov''', '''Liapunov''' or '''Ljapunow'''. Notable people with the surname include: * [[Prokopy Lyapunov]] (? –1611), Russian statesman * [[Zakhary Lyapunov]] (? – after 1612), Russian statesman, Prokopy Lyapunov's brother * [[Mikhail Lyapunov]] (1820–1868), Russian astronomer * [[Aleksandr Lyapunov]] (1857–1918), Russian mathematician and mechanician ** [[Lyapunov equation]] ** [[Lyapunov exponent]] ** [[Lyapunov function]] ** [[Lyapunov fractal]] ** [[Lyapunov stability]] ** [[Lyapunov's central limit theorem]] ** [[Lyapunov vector]] ** [[Lyapunov (crater)]] * [[Sergei Lyapunov]] (1859–1924), Russian composer * [[Boris Lyapunov]] (1862–1943), Russian expert in Slavic studies * [[Alexey Lyapunov]] (1911–1973), Russian mathematician {{surname|Lyapunov}} [[Category:Russian-language surnames]]
